name: Alta the Stormwielder
description:
The power-hungry Frudoc Clan is headed towards Alta's colony to seize the Cortex Feather, a treasured relic left behind by the colony's late, esteemed founder. Step in the shoes of Alta, a lightning-wielding prodigy,  and bend the mighty sparks of the sky to scorch the Frudocs' battalion of war machines out of your way!

Features:
- An original, illustrated story.
- A tempered fusion of the puzzle and action genre.
- Customizable loadout before starting a game.
- Challenge yourself to an endless, increasingly difficult game in Endurance Mode!
- Still not challenging enough for you? Scooch over to the Difficulty Mods section and enable up to seven different modifiers to spice up your game, including the daunting Thunderclap Mode.
- Additional statistics at the end of your game to placate the nerdy individual.
- Nine languages supported (English, Dutch, German, Polish, French, Italian, Russian, Danish, Spanish).
- Epic thumbnail artwork by FattyDragonite!
- Music by Sinesita
- Thunderous and tempestuous!
